title: Upgrade Zookeeper to 3.4.x
description: I noticed while dealing with some log4j classpath problems in SOLR-3358, that we have to include log4j-over-slf4j due to ZOOKEEPER-850, which has been resolved in 3.4.0, so we should upgrade if we can.

comments.author: David Fischer
comments.content: Another benefit of ZooKeeper 3.4.x is that it requires less maintenance (such as log file cleanup)
